results.description: Are you fed up with: Corporate life? Constant changes at work? Short termism? Your daily commute? Draining office politics? Then consider something more permanent, more rewarding something you own and have more control with the safety of a powerful brand, an organisation and a movement that provides continuity, support and constant R&D. For some reason you are now looking at a new opportunity – why? We know that at some point you’ll be in the same position again – it’s inevitable, there rarely …

Their focus is simple: Empower business owners, CEO's and Managing Directors to achieve more. What this could mean to you is there is an opportunity for you to team up with the best in the world to grow personally, learn from them and take control of your own destiny. IT Manager
results.description: Octavia Housing provides approximately 5000 affordable homes in central and west London. We now have a fantastic opportunity for an inspiring, analytical and meticulous Programme Manager to join our organisation in Central London. A leader is required to take responsibility for all aspects of IT support within the Octavia Group. Our digital transformation is real, with an exciting array of modern technology to support it and an ambitious plan to deliver further capability. We require someone wi…

Cross Keys Homes is Peterborough’s leading housing association and largest provider of affordable housing. We are also the city’s largest provider of independent living, offering a range of services from the Lifeline emergency alarm through to community care and sheltered housing. To support our continued growth we are seeking a Service Manager to lead our income management team. This is a senior leadership role, responsible for the formulation and delivery of our income collection and debt red…
